text: Clemens Gerard Antoon Cornielje (10 June 1958 – 17 March 2022) was a Dutch politician of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD), political consultant and teacher.C.G.A. (Clemens) Cornielje, Parlement.com From 1994 until 2005, Cornielje was a member of the House of Representatives, and from 2005 until 2019, Queen's/King's Commissioner of Gelderland. He was a Roman Catholic and openly gay. Cornielje was born in Lobith and diagnosed with brain cancer in 2017. He died from this illness in Arnhem at the age of 63.Rutte eert overleden oud-commissaris Clemens Cornielje (63): ‘Hij blijft in mijn herinnering als een integer en aimabel mens’ ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Dutch teachers Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Gay men Category:LGBT Christians Category:Dutch LGBT politicians Category:People's Party for Freedom and Democracy politicians Category:Politicians from Gelderland
title: Clemens Cornielje
